attributes.action: Change the tax rates for Northern Ireland to bring them in to line with the Republic of Ireland and introduce a dual currency system of Euro and Sterling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change the tax rates for Northern Ireland to bring them in to line with that of the Republic of Ireland.

Northern Ireland should also have a dual currency system of Euros and Sterling until the rest of the UK joins the Euro zone.  This would help Northern Irish business be more competitive and successful in exporting to ROI and mainland Europe.  Resulting in NI being less financially dependent on the rest of the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
